entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 04:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
